page.title: 16 HOUSING
page.content: Although {Askern }is a mining community, the pit estate is not in our area. The {housing}in our area is split between the older council { {houses}and the new private estate at the top of Moss Road. Most of the {housing}is in one small part of our area. The remainder of the area is farmland with only a handful of farm houses scattered around. We asked 81 people and found that 37 lived in semidetached houses 24 lived in terraced houses 11 lived in detached houses 8 lived in bungalows 1 lived in a cottage 1 lived in a flat Most people live in rented accommodation either from the council or the pit, but all houses in the area are modernised - they all have bathrooms for instance.
